title: The Mill in Winter: a Sketch
provenance_text:
John Henry Twachtman [1853-1902], until 1902; Estate of John Henry Twachtman, 1902 until 1903; (sold at American Art Galleries, New York, 1903, no. 70) [1]; E. A. Rorke, New York, until 1913; (Silas S. Dustin [1855-1940], by April 1913) [2]; gift to Museum, 1913. 
NOTES:1. See correspondence from Douglas Hale in curatorial file.  2. Andrew Carnegie purchased this work as a gift for the Carnegie Institute. It was delivered directly from Silas S. Dustin to the museum.
